title: Sample, ca. 1949
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 17 x 17 cm (6 11/16 x 6 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Plain weave with continuous supplementary wefts making a block pattern in pink and metallic gold. Warp is three-ply white cotton. Foundation weft is pink boucle. Continuous supplementary weft double wrapped gold metallic.
